scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-html && npm run build-css && npm run build-root
scripts.build-html-min: for f in *.html; do htmlclean $f -o dist/$f; done
scripts.build-css: cat index.css | postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-cssnext > dist/index.css
scripts.build-css-min: cat index.css | postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-cssnext | csso > dist/index.css
scripts.build-js-min: browserify -p [ tinyify --no-flat ] scripts/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] > dist/index.js
scripts.build-min: npm run build-html-min && npm run build-css-min && npm run build-js-min && npm run build-root
scripts.watch: npm run watch-html & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.start: set -m; http-server dist -so & npm run watch; fg
